title: Session Town
text: Introducing SessionTown.com - the ultimate platform for music enthusiasts and learners! As the founder, designer, and developer of Session Town, I'm proud to present this progressive web app that offers a wide range of online musical instruments and games. The platform is designed to give users a fun and educational experience.

I built Session Town from the ground up, using PHP and MySQL for the backend, and vanilla JavaScript for the frontend. My goal was to create a platform that would not only be entertaining, but also helpful for aspiring musicians.
Thanks to the efforts in SEO and SEM, Session Town has maintained a daily user base of thousands of music lovers since its launch in 2017. So come on, let's jam together!
